qas.question: When was the Nanjing Olympic Sports Center built?
Why was the Nanjing Olympic Sports Center built?

answers.text: in order to host The 10th National Game of People's Republic of China

qas.question: How many people can Nanjing Olympic Sports Center's stadium hold?
How many people can Nanjing Olympic Sports Center's gymnasium hold?
How many people can Nanjing Olympic Sports Center's natatorium hold?

context: In <a0_0>2005<a0_0/>, <a1_0>in order to host The 10th National Game of People's Republic of China<a1_0/>, there was a new stadium, Nanjing Olympic Sports Center, constructed in Nanjing. Compared to Wutaishan Sports Center, which the major stadium's capacity is 18,500, Nanjing Olympic Sports Center has a more advanced stadium which is big enough to seat <a2_0>60,000<a2_0/> spectators. Its gymnasium has capacity of <a3_0>1<a4_0>3,000<a4_0/><a3_0/>, and natatorium of capacity 3,000.
